verses.roman:
āra eka 'svabhāva' gaurera śuna, bhakta-gaṇa
aiśvarya-svabhāva gūḍha kare prakaṭana

synonyms: āra—another; eka—one; svabhāva—characteristic; gaurera—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śuna—hear; bhakta-gaṇa—O devotees; aiśvarya-svabhāva—opulences and characteristics; gūḍha—very deep; kare—does; prakaṭana—manifestation.
translation: There is yet another characteristic of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. O devotees, listen carefully to how He manifests His opulence and characteristics, although they are exceptionally deep.
